sentence.text: The proband's father was noted to have hypertelorism and telecanthus with an ICD of 4.5 cm (>97th centile), IPD 6.4 cm (>97th centile) and OCD 10 cm (>97th centile).
His head circumference was 59.5 cm (+2 SD).
He had a widow's peak and his palpebral fissures were upslanting, but his metopic suture was closed and his nose was not bifid.
His chest showed scars from a surgery to repair a pectus carinatum.
